about_the_game:
Stake N Click is a Clicker at first, that becomes an Idler if you choose. Eventually, through Incremental upgrades of weapons and consumables, you wage war against a whole vampire clan. Beware, higher vampires may yield more valuable blood per second, but they become increasingly more difficult to beat. You will need to level up your player by collecting blood from the lesser vampires first – don’t vanquish them straight away! There’s also a chance you may lose in battle, and there’s no coming back from that. Perhaps, there is some prestige to starting over though… Win by eliminating all the vampires!

Click

Clicking a shackled vampire yields a unit of blood. Letting the vamp regain blood will allow you to click again. Continue clicking and collect more blood. Click too fast and cut too deep and you may vanquish him too early!

Increment

Buy upgrades for blood on the Red Market. Open up more slots to shackle more vamps. Get ready to battle more powerful vamps with better weapons.

Idle

With a dialysis machine, you can automate your clicking and turn it into an idle game… in part. Buy one on the red market. Equipped, you can leave the game and come back later, hopefully finding a lot more blood in your bank to spend on the red market!

Battle

   

It’s a dice game to battle and capture more vampires. The more weapons you have, the more dice you get to roll, with the opportunity to re-roll your opponent’s, or even your own with the right purchases from the Red Market.

Death

Beware, if you roll less than your opponent, you will lose. Welcome death in such circumstances, because the alternative is so much worse. Players return to the start again. However, if the opponent was powerful enough, and you got close enough to winning, there could be some prestige to take forward to the next try.

Win

The aim of the game, ultimately, is to vanquish every one of the vampires. Strategy and perseverance are important – it’s not just click to win!

content_descriptors.notes: Stylized imagery of mythical horror creatures (vampires) and stylized imagery of blood, bloodstains, blood spatter, etc.

name: Stake N Click

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 5500 / AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 10500 / AMD Ryzen 7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Click a shackled vampire to extract blood. Idle using dialysis auto-clickers. Increment your gameplay by selling the blood on the red market. Capture more powerful vampires in a dice game for higher collection rates. Kill off the weak ones. Eventually, wipe out the whole clan. You can win the war!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
